name: node-red-contrib-i2c-pwm-driver
description: node-red /i2c control for the Adafruit PWM servo driver
author: Mark Moissette / niels v/d Spek

scripts.release-patch: git checkout master && npm run build; git commit -a -m 'chore(dist): built release/'; npm version patch && git push origin master --tags
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master && npm run build; git commit -a -m 'chore(dist): built release/'; npm version minor && git push origin master --tags
scripts.release-major: git checkout master && npm run build; git commit -a -m 'chore(dist): built release/'; npm version major && git push origin master --tags
